title: Inactive user (>90 days) still retains permissions to Exchange resources.
short_description: Inactive user (>90 days) still retains permissions to Exchange resources.
description: Former or dormant internal accounts still have email access. If those credentials are leaked or guessed, attackers can read mail, reset passwords, or impersonate staff, driving BEC (business email compromise) and data theft.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Inactive user (>90 days) still retains permissions to Exchange resources.
level_thresholds.business_impact: Former or dormant internal accounts still have email access. If those credentials are leaked or guessed, attackers can read mail, reset passwords, or impersonate staff, driving BEC (business email compromise) and data theft.

title: Inactive user (>90 days) still retains permissions to OneDrive resources.
short_description: Inactive user (>90 days) still retains permissions to OneDrive resources.
description: Personal OneDrive data for an inactive user remains accessible. If taken over, attackers can harvest documents or use the account as a hidden exfiltration path.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Inactive user (>90 days) still retains permissions to OneDrive resources.
level_thresholds.business_impact: Personal OneDrive data for an inactive user remains accessible. If taken over, attackers can harvest documents or use the account as a hidden exfiltration path.

title: Inactive user (>90 days) still retains permissions to SharePoint Online resources.
short_description: Inactive user (>90 days) still retains permissions to SharePoint Online resources.
description: A dormant account still has SharePoint access. If abused, broad site content can be copied or tampered with, complicating forensics and recovery.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Inactive user (>90 days) still retains permissions to SharePoint Online resources.
level_thresholds.business_impact: A dormant account still has SharePoint access. If abused, broad site content can be copied or tampered with, complicating forensics and recovery.

title: Inactive user (>90 days) still retains permissions to Microsoft Teams resources.
short_description: Inactive user (>90 days) still retains permissions to Microsoft Teams resources.
description: A stale account still sees Teams chats/files. Compromise exposes conversations, shared docs, and links, enabling lateral movement and reputational harm if sensitive discussions leak.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Inactive user (>90 days) still retains permissions to Microsoft Teams resources.
level_thresholds.business_impact: A stale account still sees Teams chats/files. Compromise exposes conversations, shared docs, and links, enabling lateral movement and reputational harm if sensitive discussions leak.

title: Orphaned users (not resolvable in directory) still appear on ACLs.
short_description: Orphaned users (not resolvable in directory) still appear on ACLs.
description: Permissions reference accounts that no longer exist (or can’t be resolved). This breaks accountability and reviews. If an identity is later re-created or mapped, it may inherit unintended access; audits also fail due to unverifiable access lists.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Orphaned users (not resolvable in directory) still appear on ACLs.
level_thresholds.business_impact: Permissions reference accounts that no longer exist (or can’t be resolved). This breaks accountability and reviews. If an identity is later re-created or mapped, it may inherit unintended access; audits also fail due to unverifiable access lists.

title: Orphaned users (not resolvable in directory) still appear on ACLs.
short_description: Orphaned users (not resolvable in directory) still appear on ACLs.
description: Permissions reference accounts that no longer exist (or can’t be resolved). This breaks accountability and reviews. If an identity is later re-created or mapped, it may inherit unintended access; audits also fail due to unverifiable access lists.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Orphaned users (not resolvable in directory) still appear on ACLs.
level_thresholds.business_impact: Permissions reference accounts that no longer exist (or can’t be resolved). This breaks accountability and reviews. If an identity is later re-created or mapped, it may inherit unintended access; audits also fail due to unverifiable access lists.

title: Broken permission inheritance
short_description: Broken permission inheritance
description: A site/library/folder stopped inheriting permissions and has custom access that’s hard to see or review. Over time, this drifts into overexposure. If exploited, unauthorized users can read/alter/delete sensitive files, causing outages, data loss, or breaches.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Broken permission inheritance
level_thresholds.business_impact: A site/library/folder stopped inheriting permissions and has custom access that’s hard to see or review. Over time, this drifts into overexposure. If exploited, unauthorized users can read/alter/delete sensitive files, causing outages, data loss, or breaches.

title: Site/workload is stale (no activity >180 days).
short_description: Site/workload is stale (no activity >180 days).
description: Old sites/teams linger without owners or reviews. They quietly accumulate risky links and guests. If exploited, they become easy backdoors for data theft and malware staging, and they complicate compliance and cleanup.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Site/workload is stale (no activity >180 days).
level_thresholds.business_impact: Old sites/teams linger without owners or reviews. They quietly accumulate risky links and guests. If exploited, they become easy backdoors for data theft and malware staging, and they complicate compliance and cleanup.

title: Site/workload is stale (no activity >180 days).
short_description: Site/workload is stale (no activity >180 days).
description: Old sites/teams linger without owners or reviews. They quietly accumulate risky links and guests. If exploited, they become easy backdoors for data theft and malware staging, and they complicate compliance and cleanup.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Site/workload is stale (no activity >180 days).
level_thresholds.business_impact: Old sites/teams linger without owners or reviews. They quietly accumulate risky links and guests. If exploited, they become easy backdoors for data theft and malware staging, and they complicate compliance and cleanup.

title: Files are stale (no access >365 days).
short_description: Files are stale (no access >365 days).
description: Old files linger but still carry sensitive data. They’re rarely reviewed, yet remain accessible. If compromised, attackers can mine years of unneeded data, increasing breach scope, incident costs, and discovery/sanctions risk.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Files are stale (no access >365 days).
level_thresholds.business_impact: Old files linger but still carry sensitive data. They’re rarely reviewed, yet remain accessible. If compromised, attackers can mine years of unneeded data, increasing breach scope, incident costs, and discovery/sanctions risk.

title: Files are stale (no access >365 days).
short_description: Files are stale (no access >365 days).
description: Old files linger but still carry sensitive data. They’re rarely reviewed, yet remain accessible. If compromised, attackers can mine years of unneeded data, increasing breach scope, incident costs, and discovery/sanctions risk.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Files are stale (no access >365 days).
level_thresholds.business_impact: Old files linger but still carry sensitive data. They’re rarely reviewed, yet remain accessible. If compromised, attackers can mine years of unneeded data, increasing breach scope, incident costs, and discovery/sanctions risk.

title: Enabled user accounts stale (no recent lastLogonTimestamp)
short_description: Enabled user accounts stale (no recent lastLogonTimestamp)
description: Enabled accounts that haven’t logged in recently are often forgotten and unmonitored. If exploited, attackers can take over these dormant accounts to bypass detection and move laterally with valid credentials.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Enabled user accounts stale (no recent lastLogonTimestamp)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Enabled accounts that haven’t logged in recently are often forgotten and unmonitored. If exploited, attackers can take over these dormant accounts to bypass detection and move laterally with valid credentials.

title: Disabled accounts still members of groups
short_description: Disabled accounts still members of groups
description: Disabled users that remain in groups keep latent privileges that can reappear if the account is re-enabled or duplicated. If exploited, reactivation or cloning restores powerful access immediately, enabling privilege escalation without going through approvals.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Disabled accounts still members of groups
level_thresholds.business_impact: Disabled users that remain in groups keep latent privileges that can reappear if the account is re-enabled or duplicated. If exploited, reactivation or cloning restores powerful access immediately, enabling privilege escalation without going through approvals.

title: Contractor accounts (employeeType=Contractor) without 'accountExpires'
short_description: Contractor accounts (employeeType=Contractor) without 'accountExpires'
description: Contractor accounts without an expiry date can outlive their business need. If exploited, former contractors (or attackers using their credentials) can continue logging in and accessing internal systems indefinitely.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Contractor accounts (employeeType=Contractor) without 'accountExpires'
level_thresholds.business_impact: Contractor accounts without an expiry date can outlive their business need. If exploited, former contractors (or attackers using their credentials) can continue logging in and accessing internal systems indefinitely.

title: Users without manager/ownership metadata (no 'manager' attribute) in privileged groups
short_description: Users without manager/ownership metadata (no 'manager' attribute) in privileged groups
description: Privileged users lacking a recorded manager/owner have weak accountability and unclear review responsibility. If exploited, risky access persists unnoticed, aiding insider threats and hampering incident response.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Users without manager/ownership metadata (no 'manager' attribute) in privileged groups
level_thresholds.business_impact: Privileged users lacking a recorded manager/owner have weak accountability and unclear review responsibility. If exploited, risky access persists unnoticed, aiding insider threats and hampering incident response.

title: Users with 'Password not required' (PASSWD_NOTREQD)
short_description: Users with 'Password not required' (PASSWD_NOTREQD)
description: Accounts allowed to exist without a password eliminate a critical security barrier. If exploited, anyone can authenticate as that user, leading to immediate data exposure or privilege abuse.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Users with 'Password not required' (PASSWD_NOTREQD)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Accounts allowed to exist without a password eliminate a critical security barrier. If exploited, anyone can authenticate as that user, leading to immediate data exposure or privilege abuse.

title: Users with reversible encryption allowed (ENCRYPTED_TEXT_PWD_ALLOWED)
short_description: Users with reversible encryption allowed (ENCRYPTED_TEXT_PWD_ALLOWED)
description: Reversible passwords are effectively stored in a recoverable form. If exploited, attackers can reconstruct cleartext passwords and reuse them across systems, accelerating compromise.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Users with reversible encryption allowed (ENCRYPTED_TEXT_PWD_ALLOWED)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Reversible passwords are effectively stored in a recoverable form. If exploited, attackers can reconstruct cleartext passwords and reuse them across systems, accelerating compromise.

title: Users with 'Do not require Kerberos preauthentication' (DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH)
short_description: Users with 'Do not require Kerberos preauthentication' (DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH)
description: Skipping Kerberos preauthentication lets attackers request encrypted blobs that can be cracked offline. If exploited, it enables identity impersonation and further lateral movement using forged tickets.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Users with 'Do not require Kerberos preauthentication' (DONT_REQUIRE_PREAUTH)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Skipping Kerberos preauthentication lets attackers request encrypted blobs that can be cracked offline. If exploited, it enables identity impersonation and further lateral movement using forged tickets.

title: krbtgt password age exceeds threshold
short_description: krbtgt password age exceeds threshold
description: The krbtgt account keys sign Kerberos tickets across the domain; they must be rotated regularly. If exploited, stolen keys allow ‘Golden Ticket’ creation, granting unlimited, stealthy domain access.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: krbtgt password age exceeds threshold
level_thresholds.business_impact: The krbtgt account keys sign Kerberos tickets across the domain; they must be rotated regularly. If exploited, stolen keys allow ‘Golden Ticket’ creation, granting unlimited, stealthy domain access.

title: Domain password policy too weak (length/history/lockout/complexity)
short_description: Domain password policy too weak (length/history/lockout/complexity)
description: Weak password rules make credentials easy to guess or crack. If exploited, attackers gain initial footholds quickly and pivot using reused or predictable passwords.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Domain password policy too weak (length/history/lockout/complexity)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Weak password rules make credentials easy to guess or crack. If exploited, attackers gain initial footholds quickly and pivot using reused or predictable passwords.

title: Users with 'Password never expires' (DONT_EXPIRE_PASSWORD)
short_description: Users with 'Password never expires' (DONT_EXPIRE_PASSWORD)
description: Never-expiring passwords turn into long-lived secrets that inevitably leak. If exploited, an old credential remains valid for months or years, enabling recurring unauthorized access.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Users with 'Password never expires' (DONT_EXPIRE_PASSWORD)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Never-expiring passwords turn into long-lived secrets that inevitably leak. If exploited, an old credential remains valid for months or years, enabling recurring unauthorized access.

title: Unconstrained delegation enabled (TRUSTED_FOR_DELEGATION)
short_description: Unconstrained delegation enabled (TRUSTED_FOR_DELEGATION)
description: Unconstrained delegation lets a service impersonate users broadly. If exploited, attackers controlling that service can capture TGTs and act as high‑privilege users anywhere in the domain.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Unconstrained delegation enabled (TRUSTED_FOR_DELEGATION)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Unconstrained delegation lets a service impersonate users broadly. If exploited, attackers controlling that service can capture TGTs and act as high‑privilege users anywhere in the domain.

title: Constrained delegation with protocol transition (TRUSTED_TO_AUTH_FOR_DELEGATION)
short_description: Constrained delegation with protocol transition (TRUSTED_TO_AUTH_FOR_DELEGATION)
description: Protocol transition allows a service to obtain Kerberos tickets without the user’s original TGT. If exploited, attackers misuse the service to impersonate users to back-end systems, including admins.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Constrained delegation with protocol transition (TRUSTED_TO_AUTH_FOR_DELEGATION)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Protocol transition allows a service to obtain Kerberos tickets without the user’s original TGT. If exploited, attackers misuse the service to impersonate users to back-end systems, including admins.

title: Risky constrained delegation targets (msDS-AllowedToDelegateTo includes DC services)
short_description: Risky constrained delegation targets (msDS-AllowedToDelegateTo includes DC services)
description: Delegation to domain controller services (like CIFS/LDAP) is overly powerful. If exploited, attackers can impersonate admins directly to DCs, leading to domain takeover.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Risky constrained delegation targets (msDS-AllowedToDelegateTo includes DC services)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Delegation to domain controller services (like CIFS/LDAP) is overly powerful. If exploited, attackers can impersonate admins directly to DCs, leading to domain takeover.

title: Resource‑based constrained delegation (RBCD) grants to low‑priv principals
short_description: Resource‑based constrained delegation (RBCD) grants to low‑priv principals
description: RBCD allows a resource to specify who can act on its behalf; granting this to low-priv objects is dangerous. If exploited, attackers abuse RBCD to impersonate users to that resource and escalate.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Resource‑based constrained delegation (RBCD) grants to low‑priv principals
level_thresholds.business_impact: RBCD allows a resource to specify who can act on its behalf; granting this to low-priv objects is dangerous. If exploited, attackers abuse RBCD to impersonate users to that resource and escalate.

title: Service accounts with SPN but no AES keys configured
short_description: Service accounts with SPN but no AES keys configured
description: Service accounts lacking modern AES keys fall back to weaker crypto (e.g., RC4), easing Kerberoasting. If exploited, attackers crack service tickets offline and reuse the recovered password across systems.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Service accounts with SPN but no AES keys configured
level_thresholds.business_impact: Service accounts lacking modern AES keys fall back to weaker crypto (e.g., RC4), easing Kerberoasting. If exploited, attackers crack service tickets offline and reuse the recovered password across systems.

title: Privileged group membership too broad (e.g., Domain Admins, Enterprise Admins)
short_description: Privileged group membership too broad (e.g., Domain Admins, Enterprise Admins)
description: Too many admins creates unnecessary blast radius and review burden. If exploited, compromise of any one admin yields full control, increasing the chance and impact of domain breach.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Privileged group membership too broad (e.g., Domain Admins, Enterprise Admins)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Too many admins creates unnecessary blast radius and review burden. If exploited, compromise of any one admin yields full control, increasing the chance and impact of domain breach.

title: Indirect privileged access via nested groups
short_description: Indirect privileged access via nested groups
description: Nested groups can hide who truly has admin rights. If exploited, attackers slip into privilege through a lower‑level group and gain powerful access that escapes simple reviews.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Indirect privileged access via nested groups
level_thresholds.business_impact: Nested groups can hide who truly has admin rights. If exploited, attackers slip into privilege through a lower‑level group and gain powerful access that escapes simple reviews.

title: Accounts with adminCount=1 but not currently in privileged groups
short_description: Accounts with adminCount=1 but not currently in privileged groups
description: AdminSDHolder ‘lingering’ flags mean an account retains protected ACLs even after leaving admin groups. If exploited, attackers leverage these protections to resist remediation or keep hidden backdoors.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Accounts with adminCount=1 but not currently in privileged groups
level_thresholds.business_impact: AdminSDHolder ‘lingering’ flags mean an account retains protected ACLs even after leaving admin groups. If exploited, attackers leverage these protections to resist remediation or keep hidden backdoors.

title: Privileged groups with foreign members (ForeignSecurityPrincipals)
short_description: Privileged groups with foreign members (ForeignSecurityPrincipals)
description: Foreign members grant external identities admin access via trusts. If exploited, attackers from another forest/domain can administer your environment or bypass local controls.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Privileged groups with foreign members (ForeignSecurityPrincipals)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Foreign members grant external identities admin access via trusts. If exploited, attackers from another forest/domain can administer your environment or bypass local controls.

title: Privileged groups missing 'managedBy' owner
short_description: Privileged groups missing 'managedBy' owner
description: Without an accountable owner, privileged groups drift and accumulate excess members. If exploited, over‑permissioned groups enable quick escalation and make cleanup slow and error‑prone.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Privileged groups missing 'managedBy' owner
level_thresholds.business_impact: Without an accountable owner, privileged groups drift and accumulate excess members. If exploited, over‑permissioned groups enable quick escalation and make cleanup slow and error‑prone.

title: Privileged accounts with 'Password never expires' set
short_description: Privileged accounts with 'Password never expires' set
description: Non‑expiring admin passwords are high‑value, long‑lived targets. If exploited, attackers retain persistent, privileged access that evades normal password‑rotation defenses.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Privileged accounts with 'Password never expires' set
level_thresholds.business_impact: Non‑expiring admin passwords are high‑value, long‑lived targets. If exploited, attackers retain persistent, privileged access that evades normal password‑rotation defenses.

title: Privileged accounts without 'Smartcard required'
short_description: Privileged accounts without 'Smartcard required'
description: Admins without strong MFA are vulnerable to phishing and credential replay. If exploited, attackers use stolen passwords or hashes to operate with admin rights, deploy malware, or exfiltrate data.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Privileged accounts without 'Smartcard required'
level_thresholds.business_impact: Admins without strong MFA are vulnerable to phishing and credential replay. If exploited, attackers use stolen passwords or hashes to operate with admin rights, deploy malware, or exfiltrate data.

title: Privileged accounts with SIDHistory present
short_description: Privileged accounts with SIDHistory present
description: SIDHistory preserves legacy privileges that may exceed current roles. If exploited, attackers replay historical SIDs to regain high-level access and evade least‑privilege controls.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Privileged accounts with SIDHistory present
level_thresholds.business_impact: SIDHistory preserves legacy privileges that may exceed current roles. If exploited, attackers replay historical SIDs to regain high-level access and evade least‑privilege controls.

title: Privileged user accounts with Service Principal Names (SPNs) set
short_description: Privileged user accounts with Service Principal Names (SPNs) set
description: Admin users with SPNs are prime Kerberoast targets. If exploited, cracked tickets yield admin passwords, enabling rapid domain‑wide compromise.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Privileged user accounts with Service Principal Names (SPNs) set
level_thresholds.business_impact: Admin users with SPNs are prime Kerberoast targets. If exploited, cracked tickets yield admin passwords, enabling rapid domain‑wide compromise.

title: Service accounts (SPN set) with 'Password never expires'
short_description: Service accounts (SPN set) with 'Password never expires'
description: Non‑expiring service secrets accumulate exposure over time. If exploited, attackers keep reusing the same credential to access critical applications and data.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Service accounts (SPN set) with 'Password never expires'
level_thresholds.business_impact: Non‑expiring service secrets accumulate exposure over time. If exploited, attackers keep reusing the same credential to access critical applications and data.

title: Service accounts with old 'pwdLastSet' (key age)
short_description: Service accounts with old 'pwdLastSet' (key age)
description: Aged service keys increase the chance they’ve leaked or been cracked. If exploited, attackers authenticate to services and pivot to databases, file shares, or code deployment systems.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Service accounts with old 'pwdLastSet' (key age)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Aged service keys increase the chance they’ve leaked or been cracked. If exploited, attackers authenticate to services and pivot to databases, file shares, or code deployment systems.

title: Service accounts not marked 'Account is sensitive and cannot be delegated' (NOT_DELEGATED)
short_description: Service accounts not marked 'Account is sensitive and cannot be delegated' (NOT_DELEGATED)
description: Sensitive service accounts should not be used for delegation. If exploited, attackers abuse delegation paths to impersonate users and expand access.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Service accounts not marked 'Account is sensitive and cannot be delegated' (NOT_DELEGATED)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Sensitive service accounts should not be used for delegation. If exploited, attackers abuse delegation paths to impersonate users and expand access.

title: User SPNs on non‑service users (misuse of user accounts for services)
short_description: User SPNs on non‑service users (misuse of user accounts for services)
description: Running services as ordinary users creates risky SPNs tied to human credentials. If exploited, Kerberoasting or password reuse exposes both the service and the person’s other access.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: User SPNs on non‑service users (misuse of user accounts for services)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Running services as ordinary users creates risky SPNs tied to human credentials. If exploited, Kerberoasting or password reuse exposes both the service and the person’s other access.

title: MachineAccountQuota allows non‑admins to join computers (ms-DS-MachineAccountQuota > 0)
short_description: MachineAccountQuota allows non‑admins to join computers (ms-DS-MachineAccountQuota > 0)
description: Allowing standard users to add machines to the domain can be abused to register rogue computers. If exploited, attackers create controlled hosts to request tickets and move laterally.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: MachineAccountQuota allows non‑admins to join computers (ms-DS-MachineAccountQuota > 0)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Allowing standard users to add machines to the domain can be abused to register rogue computers. If exploited, attackers create controlled hosts to request tickets and move laterally.

title: External/forest trusts without SID filtering (SIDHistory allowed)
short_description: External/forest trusts without SID filtering (SIDHistory allowed)
description: Trusts that accept SIDHistory can be abused to inject extra privileges across forests. If exploited, attackers forge SIDs to gain admin rights in the trusting domain.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: External/forest trusts without SID filtering (SIDHistory allowed)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Trusts that accept SIDHistory can be abused to inject extra privileges across forests. If exploited, attackers forge SIDs to gain admin rights in the trusting domain.

title: UPN suffix outside approved domains
short_description: UPN suffix outside approved domains
description: Unapproved UPN suffixes confuse identity checks and SSO routing. If exploited, attackers spoof identities or trick users into authenticating to look‑alike domains.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: UPN suffix outside approved domains
level_thresholds.business_impact: Unapproved UPN suffixes confuse identity checks and SSO routing. If exploited, attackers spoof identities or trick users into authenticating to look‑alike domains.

title: Admin accounts not in Protected Users group
short_description: Admin accounts not in Protected Users group
description: Protected Users enhances safeguards (no NTLM, no cached creds, limited delegation). If exploited, absence of these controls makes admin credentials easier to steal and reuse.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Admin accounts not in Protected Users group
level_thresholds.business_impact: Protected Users enhances safeguards (no NTLM, no cached creds, limited delegation). If exploited, absence of these controls makes admin credentials easier to steal and reuse.

title: Admin accounts with SPN configured
short_description: Admin accounts with SPN configured
description: Admin SPNs expose high‑value tickets to Kerberoasting. If exploited, cracked hashes yield administrator passwords and immediate escalation.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Admin accounts with SPN configured
level_thresholds.business_impact: Admin SPNs expose high‑value tickets to Kerberoasting. If exploited, cracked hashes yield administrator passwords and immediate escalation.

title: Admin accounts with unprivileged owners
short_description: Admin accounts with unprivileged owners
description: If non‑admins own admin accounts/objects, they can silently change permissions. If exploited, attackers maintain hidden control and undo security fixes.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Admin accounts with unprivileged owners
level_thresholds.business_impact: If non‑admins own admin accounts/objects, they can silently change permissions. If exploited, attackers maintain hidden control and undo security fixes.

title: Admin accounts without adminCount=1
short_description: Admin accounts without adminCount=1
description: Privileged accounts should inherit AdminSDHolder protections. If exploited, missing protections allow permission drift or malicious ACL changes on admin principals.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Admin accounts without adminCount=1
level_thresholds.business_impact: Privileged accounts should inherit AdminSDHolder protections. If exploited, missing protections allow permission drift or malicious ACL changes on admin principals.

title: Clear Text Password
short_description: Clear Text Password
description: Passwords stored or transmitted in clear text are immediately readable. If exploited, attackers log in directly, impersonate users, and exfiltrate data without cracking.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Clear Text Password
level_thresholds.business_impact: Passwords stored or transmitted in clear text are immediately readable. If exploited, attackers log in directly, impersonate users, and exfiltrate data without cracking.

title: DES Encryption Only
short_description: DES Encryption Only
description: DES is obsolete and weak for Kerberos encryption. If exploited, attackers forge or crack tickets far faster, enabling impersonation and domain traversal.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: DES Encryption Only
level_thresholds.business_impact: DES is obsolete and weak for Kerberos encryption. If exploited, attackers forge or crack tickets far faster, enabling impersonation and domain traversal.

title: Disabled admin accounts present
short_description: Disabled admin accounts present
description: Disabled admin accounts clutter directories and may be re‑enabled by mistake. If exploited, reactivation restores powerful access without scrutiny.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Disabled admin accounts present
level_thresholds.business_impact: Disabled admin accounts clutter directories and may be re‑enabled by mistake. If exploited, reactivation restores powerful access without scrutiny.

title: Disabled members in sensitive groups
short_description: Disabled members in sensitive groups
description: Disabled users left in admin groups retain latent privilege links. If exploited, re‑enablement or SID reuse instantly grants elevated access.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Disabled members in sensitive groups
level_thresholds.business_impact: Disabled users left in admin groups retain latent privilege links. If exploited, re‑enablement or SID reuse instantly grants elevated access.

title: Foreign Security Principals in admin groups
short_description: Foreign Security Principals in admin groups
description: External identities in admin groups rely on trust configurations you might not control. If exploited, attackers from partner/child forests can administer your environment.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Foreign Security Principals in admin groups
level_thresholds.business_impact: External identities in admin groups rely on trust configurations you might not control. If exploited, attackers from partner/child forests can administer your environment.

title: Guest account enabled
short_description: Guest account enabled
description: The built‑in Guest account bypasses normal onboarding and auditing. If exploited, anonymous or shared access can modify data and mask who did it.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Guest account enabled
level_thresholds.business_impact: The built‑in Guest account bypasses normal onboarding and auditing. If exploited, anonymous or shared access can modify data and mask who did it.

title: Kerberos krbtgt account with old password
short_description: Kerberos krbtgt account with old password
description: Old krbtgt keys allow long‑lived ticket forgery. If exploited, attackers mint ‘Golden Tickets’ to persist with near‑invisibility.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Kerberos krbtgt account with old password
level_thresholds.business_impact: Old krbtgt keys allow long‑lived ticket forgery. If exploited, attackers mint ‘Golden Tickets’ to persist with near‑invisibility.

title: Krbtgt account with Resource-Based Constrained Delegation
short_description: Krbtgt account with Resource-Based Constrained Delegation
description: Delegation settings touching krbtgt/DCs are extremely risky. If exploited, attackers impersonate users to core services and compromise the domain.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Krbtgt account with Resource-Based Constrained Delegation
level_thresholds.business_impact: Delegation settings touching krbtgt/DCs are extremely risky. If exploited, attackers impersonate users to core services and compromise the domain.

title: LM Hash
short_description: LM Hash
description: LM hashes are trivial to crack with modern hardware. If exploited, attackers quickly recover passwords and reuse them across systems.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: LM Hash
level_thresholds.business_impact: LM hashes are trivial to crack with modern hardware. If exploited, attackers quickly recover passwords and reuse them across systems.

title: Non-admins in DNS Admins group
short_description: Non-admins in DNS Admins group
description: DNSAdmins can load code into the DNS service on DCs, effectively becoming Domain Admin. If exploited, attackers execute arbitrary code and seize domain control.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Non-admins in DNS Admins group
level_thresholds.business_impact: DNSAdmins can load code into the DNS service on DCs, effectively becoming Domain Admin. If exploited, attackers execute arbitrary code and seize domain control.

title: Objects created in past 7 days
short_description: Objects created in past 7 days
description: A surge in new objects (users/computers) can signal staging or misconfiguration. If exploited, attackers hide backdoor accounts among legitimate changes and return later.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Objects created in past 7 days
level_thresholds.business_impact: A surge in new objects (users/computers) can signal staging or misconfiguration. If exploited, attackers hide backdoor accounts among legitimate changes and return later.

title: Objects with Constrained Delegation
short_description: Objects with Constrained Delegation
description: Delegation permits services to act on users’ behalf to specific targets. If exploited, attackers pivot through those services to impersonate users and reach sensitive systems.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Objects with Constrained Delegation
level_thresholds.business_impact: Delegation permits services to act on users’ behalf to specific targets. If exploited, attackers pivot through those services to impersonate users and reach sensitive systems.

title: Old password (>180 days) in Sensitive Security Groups
short_description: Old password (>180 days) in Sensitive Security Groups
description: Aged privileged passwords increase exposure and reuse risk. If exploited, attackers leverage unchanged secrets to operate as admins.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Old password (>180 days) in Sensitive Security Groups
level_thresholds.business_impact: Aged privileged passwords increase exposure and reuse risk. If exploited, attackers leverage unchanged secrets to operate as admins.

title: Oldest password in sensitive groups
short_description: Oldest password in sensitive groups
description: Tracking the oldest privileged password highlights worst‑case risk. If exploited, that one weak link can enable wide‑reaching compromise.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Oldest password in sensitive groups
level_thresholds.business_impact: Tracking the oldest privileged password highlights worst‑case risk. If exploited, that one weak link can enable wide‑reaching compromise.

title: Password expired
short_description: Password expired
description: Expired passwords indicate lifecycle issues and potential account neglect. If exploited (e.g., via reset processes), attackers may socially engineer resets to take control.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Password expired
level_thresholds.business_impact: Expired passwords indicate lifecycle issues and potential account neglect. If exploited (e.g., via reset processes), attackers may socially engineer resets to take control.

title: Password never expires
short_description: Password never expires
description: Perpetual passwords accumulate exposure and reuse. If exploited, attackers keep access for long periods without triggering rotations.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Password never expires
level_thresholds.business_impact: Perpetual passwords accumulate exposure and reuse. If exploited, attackers keep access for long periods without triggering rotations.

title: Password not required
short_description: Password not required
description: Accounts allowed without passwords remove core authentication. If exploited, unauthorized users authenticate instantly as the account.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Password not required
level_thresholds.business_impact: Accounts allowed without passwords remove core authentication. If exploited, unauthorized users authenticate instantly as the account.

title: Password not required in sensitive groups
short_description: Password not required in sensitive groups
description: Admin accounts without required passwords are catastrophic. If exploited, attackers gain domain‑level access with no barrier.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Password not required in sensitive groups
level_thresholds.business_impact: Admin accounts without required passwords are catastrophic. If exploited, attackers gain domain‑level access with no barrier.

title: Passwords older than a year
short_description: Passwords older than a year
description: Very old passwords are likely known or reused. If exploited, attackers authenticate freely and blend in using valid credentials.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Passwords older than a year
level_thresholds.business_impact: Very old passwords are likely known or reused. If exploited, attackers authenticate freely and blend in using valid credentials.

title: Passwords stored with reversible encryption
short_description: Passwords stored with reversible encryption
description: Reversible storage means passwords can be recovered from directory data. If exploited, attackers steal cleartext credentials and reuse them widely.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Passwords stored with reversible encryption
level_thresholds.business_impact: Reversible storage means passwords can be recovered from directory data. If exploited, attackers steal cleartext credentials and reuse them widely.

title: Pre-Windows 2000 Compatible Access group members
short_description: Pre-Windows 2000 Compatible Access group members
description: This legacy group broadens read access for backward compatibility. If exploited, attackers enumerate sensitive objects and plan targeted attacks.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Pre-Windows 2000 Compatible Access group members
level_thresholds.business_impact: This legacy group broadens read access for backward compatibility. If exploited, attackers enumerate sensitive objects and plan targeted attacks.

title: Recent logon by BUILTIN\Administrator
short_description: Recent logon by BUILTIN\Administrator
description: Use of the built‑in Administrator signals backdoor or unsafe practices. If exploited, attackers operate under a well‑known, powerful identity that’s hard to trace to a person.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Recent logon by BUILTIN\Administrator
level_thresholds.business_impact: Use of the built‑in Administrator signals backdoor or unsafe practices. If exploited, attackers operate under a well‑known, powerful identity that’s hard to trace to a person.

title: Recently created admins
short_description: Recently created admins
description: New admin accounts require heightened scrutiny and approvals. If exploited, attackers create stealthy admins and retain access even after cleanup.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Recently created admins
level_thresholds.business_impact: New admin accounts require heightened scrutiny and approvals. If exploited, attackers create stealthy admins and retain access even after cleanup.

title: Resource-Based Constrained Delegation on a computer
short_description: Resource-Based Constrained Delegation on a computer
description: RBCD lets a computer designate who can act for it. If exploited, attackers impersonate users to that host’s services and escalate.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Resource-Based Constrained Delegation on a computer
level_thresholds.business_impact: RBCD lets a computer designate who can act for it. If exploited, attackers impersonate users to that host’s services and escalate.

title: Service Accounts trusted for delegation
short_description: Service Accounts trusted for delegation
description: Delegation‑trusted accounts can impersonate users to certain services. If exploited, attackers expand access paths and harvest sensitive data via impersonation.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Service Accounts trusted for delegation
level_thresholds.business_impact: Delegation‑trusted accounts can impersonate users to certain services. If exploited, attackers expand access paths and harvest sensitive data via impersonation.

title: User accounts with SPN configured
short_description: User accounts with SPN configured
description: User SPNs expose tickets to Kerberoasting. If exploited, cracked hashes reveal the user’s password and any shared credentials.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: User accounts with SPN configured
level_thresholds.business_impact: User SPNs expose tickets to Kerberoasting. If exploited, cracked hashes reveal the user’s password and any shared credentials.

title: Users with Unconstrained Delegation
short_description: Users with Unconstrained Delegation
description: Unconstrained delegation on users lets them capture TGTs presented to their services. If exploited, attackers impersonate high‑value users broadly.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Users with Unconstrained Delegation
level_thresholds.business_impact: Unconstrained delegation on users lets them capture TGTs presented to their services. If exploited, attackers impersonate high‑value users broadly.

title: Functional levels of the forest and domains
short_description: AD forest/domain functional level determines available security features
description:
Active Directory forest and domain functional levels control which features are
available in the environment. Higher functional levels enable critical security
capabilities including fine-grained password policies, advanced audit capabilities,
authentication policies, Protected Users security group, and enhanced Kerberos
protections. Running older functional levels leaves the organization vulnerable
to attacks that modern security features would prevent or detect.
cis_v8_control: 4.1: Establish and Maintain a Secure Configuration Process, 5.1: Establish and Maintain an Inventory of Accounts
iso_27001_annex: A.8.9: Configuration management, A.9.2.1: User registration and de-registration

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Forest or any domain at functional level below Windows Server 2008
level_thresholds.business_impact:
Ancient functional levels (Windows 2000/2003) lack fundamental modern
security features:
- No fine-grained password policies (different policies per user group)
- No Read-Only Domain Controller (RODC) support
- Weak Kerberos encryption (DES/RC4 only)
- No Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) support
- Limited audit capabilities
- Vulnerable to known privilege escalation attacks

These environments are trivially compromised by modern attack tools.
level_thresholds.threat_timeline: Exploitable within hours with public tools
level_thresholds.attacker_profile: Low skill - script kiddie with Mimikatz

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Forest or any domain below Windows Server 2012 R2 functional level
level_thresholds.business_impact:
Missing critical modern security features introduced in 2012 R2:
- No Authentication Policies (restrict domain admin logon locations)
- No Protected Users security group (uncacheable credentials, mandatory AES)
- No Dynamic Access Control for file classification
- Limited device claims and compound authentication
- Reduced audit granularity for privilege operations

Attackers can more easily move laterally with stolen admin credentials.
level_thresholds.threat_timeline: Exploitable within days by skilled attackers

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Forest or any domain below Windows Server 2016 functional level
level_thresholds.business_impact:
Missing security enhancements from Windows Server 2016:
- No Privileged Access Management (time-bound admin rights)
- Weaker credential guard capabilities
- Limited rolling of KRBTGT account features
- Reduced granularity in permission auditing
- Missing security configuration improvements

While not immediately exploitable, these gaps complicate security
operations and incident response.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Forest or any domain below Windows Server 2019 functional level
level_thresholds.business_impact:
Missing latest security improvements from Windows Server 2019/2022:
- No LDAP channel binding enforcement options
- Limited NTLM auditing capabilities
- Missing some Kerberos encryption improvements
- Reduced visibility in security event logging
- Cannot leverage latest Microsoft Defender for Identity features

These are incremental improvements that provide defense-in-depth.
level_thresholds.threat_timeline: Low exploitation risk, limits advanced defense
missing_features: Enhanced LDAP signing and channel binding
Latest Microsoft Defender for Identity integration

tags: T1558: Steal or Forge Kerberos Tickets, T1550: Use Alternate Authentication Material

title: Non-expiring (permanent) links are allowed.
short_description: Non-expiring (permanent) links are allowed.
description: Share links never expire. Old links continue to work long after the business need ends. If they surface in email threads, tickets, or web caches, outsiders may gain indefinite access to sensitive files.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Non-expiring (permanent) links are allowed.
level_thresholds.business_impact: Share links never expire. Old links continue to work long after the business need ends. If they surface in email threads, tickets, or web caches, outsiders may gain indefinite access to sensitive files.

title: Non-expiring (permanent) links are allowed.
short_description: Non-expiring (permanent) links are allowed.
description: Share links never expire. Old links continue to work long after the business need ends. If they surface in email threads, tickets, or web caches, outsiders may gain indefinite access to sensitive files.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Non-expiring (permanent) links are allowed.
level_thresholds.business_impact: Share links never expire. Old links continue to work long after the business need ends. If they surface in email threads, tickets, or web caches, outsiders may gain indefinite access to sensitive files.

title: Org-wide Teams sharing  (scope == organization)
short_description: Org-wide Teams sharing  (scope == organization)
description: Teams channels or files are visible to everyone in the company by default. This increases insider risk and accidental exposure of HR, finance, or legal content, and makes it easier for attackers with any compromised account to find crown-jewel data.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Org-wide Teams sharing  (scope == organization)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Teams channels or files are visible to everyone in the company by default. This increases insider risk and accidental exposure of HR, finance, or legal content, and makes it easier for attackers with any compromised account to find crown-jewel data.

title: Anonymous sharing links are enabled (scope == anonymous).
short_description: Anonymous sharing links are enabled (scope == anonymous).
description: Share links don’t require authentication across SharePoint/OneDrive. Anyone who gets the URL (even unintentionally) can access the file. If exposed (e.g., pasted into a ticket or chat), data can spread publicly and evade access logs, creating regulatory and reputational risk.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Anonymous sharing links are enabled (scope == anonymous).
level_thresholds.business_impact: Share links don’t require authentication across SharePoint/OneDrive. Anyone who gets the URL (even unintentionally) can access the file. If exposed (e.g., pasted into a ticket or chat), data can spread publicly and evade access logs, creating regulatory and reputational risk.

title: Anonymous sharing links are enabled (scope == anonymous).
short_description: Anonymous sharing links are enabled (scope == anonymous).
description: Share links don’t require authentication across SharePoint/OneDrive. Anyone who gets the URL (even unintentionally) can access the file. If exposed (e.g., pasted into a ticket or chat), data can spread publicly and evade access logs, creating regulatory and reputational risk.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Anonymous sharing links are enabled (scope == anonymous).
level_thresholds.business_impact: Share links don’t require authentication across SharePoint/OneDrive. Anyone who gets the URL (even unintentionally) can access the file. If exposed (e.g., pasted into a ticket or chat), data can spread publicly and evade access logs, creating regulatory and reputational risk.

title: Anonymous links to files shared via Teams (backed by SharePoint/OneDrive) are enabled (scope == anonymous).
short_description: Anonymous links to files shared via Teams (backed by SharePoint/OneDrive) are enabled (scope == anonymous).
description: Files shared in Teams can be opened by anyone with the link—no sign-in required. If that link is forwarded or leaked, outsiders can read or download sensitive content without leaving a trace, leading to data leaks, loss of IP, and potential compliance fines.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Anonymous links to files shared via Teams (backed by SharePoint/OneDrive) are enabled (scope == anonymous).
level_thresholds.business_impact: Files shared in Teams can be opened by anyone with the link—no sign-in required. If that link is forwarded or leaked, outsiders can read or download sensitive content without leaving a trace, leading to data leaks, loss of IP, and potential compliance fines.

title: File Shared with Everyone
short_description: File Shared with Everyone
description: A file or folder is open to all employees by default (“Everyone”/“Everyone except external users”). This breaks least-privilege. If abused, sensitive data can be harvested at scale by any compromised internal account.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File Shared with Everyone
level_thresholds.business_impact: A file or folder is open to all employees by default (“Everyone”/“Everyone except external users”). This breaks least-privilege. If abused, sensitive data can be harvested at scale by any compromised internal account.

title: External recipient/guest has access to sensitive mailbox items or shared mailboxes.
short_description: External recipient/guest has access to sensitive mailbox items or shared mailboxes.
description: Non-employees can read internal email content or attachments. If their account is compromised—or they leave their company—confidential communications and PII can be exfiltrated, enabling phishing, legal exposure, or insider trading concerns.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: External recipient/guest has access to sensitive mailbox items or shared mailboxes.
level_thresholds.business_impact: Non-employees can read internal email content or attachments. If their account is compromised—or they leave their company—confidential communications and PII can be exfiltrated, enabling phishing, legal exposure, or insider trading concerns.

title: Guest user has access to sensitive content.
short_description: Guest user has access to sensitive content.
description: A partner/contractor account can view internal confidential data. If that guest account is hijacked or misused, information can be copied externally, harming competitive position and triggering contractual or regulatory issues.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Guest user has access to sensitive content.
level_thresholds.business_impact: A partner/contractor account can view internal confidential data. If that guest account is hijacked or misused, information can be copied externally, harming competitive position and triggering contractual or regulatory issues.

title: Guest user has access to sensitive content.
short_description: Guest user has access to sensitive content.
description: A partner/contractor account can view internal confidential data. If that guest account is hijacked or misused, information can be copied externally, harming competitive position and triggering contractual or regulatory issues.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Guest user has access to sensitive content.
level_thresholds.business_impact: A partner/contractor account can view internal confidential data. If that guest account is hijacked or misused, information can be copied externally, harming competitive position and triggering contractual or regulatory issues.

title: Guest user has access to sensitive content.
short_description: Guest user has access to sensitive content.
description: A partner/contractor account can view internal confidential data. If that guest account is hijacked or misused, information can be copied externally, harming competitive position and triggering contractual or regulatory issues.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Guest user has access to sensitive content.
level_thresholds.business_impact: A partner/contractor account can view internal confidential data. If that guest account is hijacked or misused, information can be copied externally, harming competitive position and triggering contractual or regulatory issues.

title: Sensitive data (emails/attachments) shared externally across multiple domains.
short_description: Sensitive data (emails/attachments) shared externally across multiple domains.
description: Regulated or confidential email content is spread to many third-party domains. The wider the spread, the harder revocation and tracking become—raising breach impact, notification obligations, and legal exposure.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sensitive data (emails/attachments) shared externally across multiple domains.
level_thresholds.business_impact: Regulated or confidential email content is spread to many third-party domains. The wider the spread, the harder revocation and tracking become—raising breach impact, notification obligations, and legal exposure.

title: Sensitive files shared to multiple external domains.
short_description: Sensitive files shared to multiple external domains.
description: Files are shared with many outside organizations. Each domain adds risk—harder to control copies, increased chance of leaks, and complex incident response if data turns up elsewhere.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sensitive files shared to multiple external domains.
level_thresholds.business_impact: Files are shared with many outside organizations. Each domain adds risk—harder to control copies, increased chance of leaks, and complex incident response if data turns up elsewhere.

title: Sensitive files shared to multiple external domains.
short_description: Sensitive files shared to multiple external domains.
description: Files are shared with many outside organizations. Each domain adds risk—harder to control copies, increased chance of leaks, and complex incident response if data turns up elsewhere.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sensitive files shared to multiple external domains.
level_thresholds.business_impact: Files are shared with many outside organizations. Each domain adds risk—harder to control copies, increased chance of leaks, and complex incident response if data turns up elsewhere.

title: Sensitive files shared to multiple external domains.
short_description: Sensitive files shared to multiple external domains.
description: Files are shared with many outside organizations. Each domain adds risk—harder to control copies, increased chance of leaks, and complex incident response if data turns up elsewhere.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sensitive files shared to multiple external domains.
level_thresholds.business_impact: Files are shared with many outside organizations. Each domain adds risk—harder to control copies, increased chance of leaks, and complex incident response if data turns up elsewhere.

title: Shared Channels with sensitive content
short_description: Shared Channels with sensitive content
description: Teams Shared Channels can include external organizations. A misstep in membership or classification exposes high-value content across tenants; if exploited, competitors or threat actors gain ongoing access to conversations and files.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Shared Channels with sensitive content
level_thresholds.business_impact: Teams Shared Channels can include external organizations. A misstep in membership or classification exposes high-value content across tenants; if exploited, competitors or threat actors gain ongoing access to conversations and files.

title: Inactive external recipient/guest still has access to sensitive mailbox data.
short_description: Inactive external recipient/guest still has access to sensitive mailbox data.
description: A guest who no longer engages still retains mailbox access. Dormant accounts are easy targets; if breached, attackers quietly read sensitive mail, pivoting to fraud (e.g., invoice/CEO fraud) and brand damage.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Inactive external recipient/guest still has access to sensitive mailbox data.
level_thresholds.business_impact: A guest who no longer engages still retains mailbox access. Dormant accounts are easy targets; if breached, attackers quietly read sensitive mail, pivoting to fraud (e.g., invoice/CEO fraud) and brand damage.

title: File System Empty Shares
short_description: File System Empty Shares
description: Unused shares increase attack surface and confusion. If exploited, attackers stage tools or data exfiltration paths that go unnoticed.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File System Empty Shares
level_thresholds.business_impact: Unused shares increase attack surface and confusion. If exploited, attackers stage tools or data exfiltration paths that go unnoticed.

title: File System missing full control ACE
short_description: File System missing full control ACE
description: Some folders are missing a Full Control access control entry (ACE) for trusted administrators (e.g., BUILTIN\Administrators or NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM). Without that safety net, IT may be unable to reliably change permissions, evict bad entries, or recover ownership during incidents, backups, or migrations. If exploited, an attacker who gains write access can lock out admins by adding Deny ACEs, disable inheritance, replace the owner, and hide malicious files—turning routine remediation into an outage that may require offline recovery or restores. The result can be prolonged downtime, data loss, blocked investigations, and higher impact from ransomware or insider abuse.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File System missing full control ACE
level_thresholds.business_impact: Some folders are missing a Full Control access control entry (ACE) for trusted administrators (e.g., BUILTIN\Administrators or NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM). Without that safety net, IT may be unable to reliably change permissions, evict bad entries, or recover ownership during incidents, backups, or migrations. If exploited, an attacker who gains write access can lock out admins by adding Deny ACEs, disable inheritance, replace the owner, and hide malicious files—turning routine remediation into an outage that may require offline recovery or restores. The result can be prolonged downtime, data loss, blocked investigations, and higher impact from ransomware or insider abuse.

title: File system change permissions/take ownership to non-admins
short_description: File system change permissions/take ownership to non-admins
description: Granting change‑permissions/ownership to non‑admins lets users rewrite access controls. If exploited, attackers elevate their own access and lock out legitimate owners.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File system change permissions/take ownership to non-admins
level_thresholds.business_impact: Granting change‑permissions/ownership to non‑admins lets users rewrite access controls. If exploited, attackers elevate their own access and lock out legitimate owners.

title: File system unintended inheritance to sensitive paths
short_description: File system unintended inheritance to sensitive paths
description: Some folders automatically inherit permissions from parent folders, unintentionally granting access to sensitive data. If exploited, an attacker who gains access to a parent location can inherit read/modify rights to confidential files, enabling silent data theft or tampering.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File system unintended inheritance to sensitive paths
level_thresholds.business_impact: Some folders automatically inherit permissions from parent folders, unintentionally granting access to sensitive data. If exploited, an attacker who gains access to a parent location can inherit read/modify rights to confidential files, enabling silent data theft or tampering.

title: File system broken inheritance with excessive explicit aces
short_description: File system broken inheritance with excessive explicit aces
description: Too many explicit permissions make ACLs complex and error‑prone. If exploited, attackers find overlooked grants to reach sensitive data unnoticed.
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File system broken inheritance with excessive explicit aces
level_thresholds.business_impact: Too many explicit permissions make ACLs complex and error‑prone. If exploited, attackers find overlooked grants to reach sensitive data unnoticed.

title: File system orphaned sids in acls
short_description: File system orphaned sids in acls
description: Orphaned SIDs represent unknown or deleted accounts that still hold rights. If exploited, attackers can recreate those SIDs or confuse reviews to keep illicit access.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File system orphaned sids in acls
level_thresholds.business_impact: Orphaned SIDs represent unknown or deleted accounts that still hold rights. If exploited, attackers can recreate those SIDs or confuse reviews to keep illicit access.

title: File system over-nested groups creating implicit access
short_description: File system over-nested groups creating implicit access
description: Deep group nesting hides who truly has file access. If exploited, attackers gain data access through indirect group paths that audits miss.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File system over-nested groups creating implicit access
level_thresholds.business_impact: Deep group nesting hides who truly has file access. If exploited, attackers gain data access through indirect group paths that audits miss.

title: File system local accounts on in acls
short_description: File system local accounts on in acls
description: Local machine accounts in ACLs are hard to track across servers. If exploited, attackers compromise one server and gain access to files elsewhere via those local identities.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File system local accounts on in acls
level_thresholds.business_impact: Local machine accounts in ACLs are hard to track across servers. If exploited, attackers compromise one server and gain access to files elsewhere via those local identities.

title: File system stale privileged access
short_description: File system stale privileged access
description: Old grants linger after roles change, expanding the attack surface. If exploited, attackers use forgotten rights to read or alter sensitive data.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File system stale privileged access
level_thresholds.business_impact: Old grants linger after roles change, expanding the attack surface. If exploited, attackers use forgotten rights to read or alter sensitive data.

title: File system broad access to hidden/admin shares
short_description: File system broad access to hidden/admin shares
description: Administrative shares (e.g., C$, ADMIN$) and hidden shares should be tightly controlled. If exploited, attackers sweep systems, deploy tools, and exfiltrate data over SMB.
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File system broad access to hidden/admin shares
level_thresholds.business_impact: Administrative shares (e.g., C$, ADMIN$) and hidden shares should be tightly controlled. If exploited, attackers sweep systems, deploy tools, and exfiltrate data over SMB.

title: File system sensitive data at share root with modify rights
short_description: File system sensitive data at share root with modify rights
description: Placing sensitive data at share roots with modify permissions increases accidental and malicious changes. If exploited, attackers overwrite or encrypt data at scale (ransomware).
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File system sensitive data at share root with modify rights
level_thresholds.business_impact: Placing sensitive data at share roots with modify permissions increases accidental and malicious changes. If exploited, attackers overwrite or encrypt data at scale (ransomware).

title: File system excessive acl entries (acl bloat)
short_description: File system excessive acl entries (acl bloat)
description: Bloated ACLs are difficult to review and easy to misconfigure. If exploited, attackers find gaps to escalate access or hide persistence via permissions.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File system excessive acl entries (acl bloat)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Bloated ACLs are difficult to review and easy to misconfigure. If exploited, attackers find gaps to escalate access or hide persistence via permissions.

title: File system sensitive data unencrypted at rest
short_description: File system sensitive data unencrypted at rest
description: Critical files stored without encryption are readable if storage is compromised. If exploited, attackers exfiltrate high‑value data with minimal effort and little trace.
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling; Annex A: Cryptography / protection of information at rest

level_thresholds.threshold_description: File system sensitive data unencrypted at rest
level_thresholds.business_impact: Critical files stored without encryption are readable if storage is compromised. If exploited, attackers exfiltrate high‑value data with minimal effort and little trace.

title: Sharepoint sensitive data with visitors group misconfigured for edit
short_description: Sharepoint sensitive data with visitors group misconfigured for edit
description: Visitors should be read‑only; granting edit to visitors broadens write access. If exploited, attackers alter or plant malicious files and mislead users.
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sharepoint sensitive data with visitors group misconfigured for edit
level_thresholds.business_impact: Visitors should be read‑only; granting edit to visitors broadens write access. If exploited, attackers alter or plant malicious files and mislead users.

title: Sharepoint missing site owners (orphaned site)
short_description: Sharepoint missing site owners (orphaned site)
description: Sites without owners lack stewardship and review. If exploited, attackers quietly accumulate access and manipulate content without accountability.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sharepoint missing site owners (orphaned site)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Sites without owners lack stewardship and review. If exploited, attackers quietly accumulate access and manipulate content without accountability.

title: Sharepoint open access (anyone links present)
short_description: Sharepoint open access (anyone links present)
description: ‘Anyone’ links allow anonymous access from the internet. If exploited, sensitive documents leak publicly and can be indexed by search engines.
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sharepoint open access (anyone links present)
level_thresholds.business_impact: ‘Anyone’ links allow anonymous access from the internet. If exploited, sensitive documents leak publicly and can be indexed by search engines.

title: Sharepoint anyone links with edit
short_description: Sharepoint anyone links with edit
description: Anonymous edit links let unauthenticated users change files. If exploited, attackers deface content, insert malware, or corrupt records.
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sharepoint anyone links with edit
level_thresholds.business_impact: Anonymous edit links let unauthenticated users change files. If exploited, attackers deface content, insert malware, or corrupt records.

title: Sharepoint anyone links without expiration
short_description: Sharepoint anyone links without expiration
description: Non‑expiring public links remain open indefinitely. If exploited, long‑forgotten links enable ongoing data leakage.
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sharepoint anyone links without expiration
level_thresholds.business_impact: Non‑expiring public links remain open indefinitely. If exploited, long‑forgotten links enable ongoing data leakage.

title: Sharepoint external sharing to consumer domains
short_description: Sharepoint external sharing to consumer domains
description: Sharing to personal email domains weakens identity assurance and revocation. If exploited, attackers forward or retain access beyond business need.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sharepoint external sharing to consumer domains
level_thresholds.business_impact: Sharing to personal email domains weakens identity assurance and revocation. If exploited, attackers forward or retain access beyond business need.

title: Sharepoint guest accounts as site owners / full control
short_description: Sharepoint guest accounts as site owners / full control
description: Guests with owner/full control bypass internal governance. If exploited, external users change permissions, exfiltrate data, or delete evidence.
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sharepoint guest accounts as site owners / full control
level_thresholds.business_impact: Guests with owner/full control bypass internal governance. If exploited, external users change permissions, exfiltrate data, or delete evidence.

title: Sharepoint excessive unique permissions (broken inheritance sprawl)
short_description: Sharepoint excessive unique permissions (broken inheritance sprawl)
description: Too many unique permissions create chaos and blind spots. If exploited, attackers hide access in one-off ACLs that reviews miss.
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sharepoint excessive unique permissions (broken inheritance sprawl)
level_thresholds.business_impact: Too many unique permissions create chaos and blind spots. If exploited, attackers hide access in one-off ACLs that reviews miss.

title: Sharepoint 'everyone except external users' on sensitive libraries
short_description: Sharepoint 'everyone except external users' on sensitive libraries
description: This broad group grants access to nearly all employees. If exploited, sensitive data spreads internally and is easier to exfiltrate by any compromised user.
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sharepoint 'everyone except external users' on sensitive libraries
level_thresholds.business_impact: This broad group grants access to nearly all employees. If exploited, sensitive data spreads internally and is easier to exfiltrate by any compromised user.

title: Sharepoint sensitive data accessible to 'everyone except external users'
short_description: Sharepoint sensitive data accessible to 'everyone except external users'
description: Sensitive documents should never be broadly exposed. If exploited, any phished or malicious insider can mass-download data.
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sharepoint sensitive data accessible to 'everyone except external users'
level_thresholds.business_impact: Sensitive documents should never be broadly exposed. If exploited, any phished or malicious insider can mass-download data.

title: Sharepoint sensitive data in communication sites with anonymous links
short_description: Sharepoint sensitive data in communication sites with anonymous links
description: Communication sites are often internet-facing; anonymous links add risk. If exploited, external actors retrieve confidential files without authentication.
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sharepoint sensitive data in communication sites with anonymous links
level_thresholds.business_impact: Communication sites are often internet-facing; anonymous links add risk. If exploited, external actors retrieve confidential files without authentication.

title: Sharepoint sensitive data + anyone link
short_description: Sharepoint sensitive data + anyone link
description: Combining sensitive content with public links multiplies exposure. If exploited, widespread, hard‑to‑trace data leaks occur rapidly.
iso_27001_annex: Annex A: Access control; Annex A: Information classification & handling

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sharepoint sensitive data + anyone link
level_thresholds.business_impact: Combining sensitive content with public links multiplies exposure. If exploited, widespread, hard‑to‑trace data leaks occur rapidly.

title: Sharepoint files unresolved owner
short_description: Sharepoint files unresolved owner
description: Orphaned files lack stewardship and review. If exploited, attackers alter or exfiltrate data while oversight is missing.

level_thresholds.threshold_description: Sharepoint files unresolved owner
level_thresholds.business_impact: Orphaned files lack stewardship and review. If exploited, attackers alter or exfiltrate data while oversight is missing.

title: Onedrive sensitive data in personal employee drives
short_description: Onedrive sensitive data in personal employee drives
description: Personal OneDrives often bypass team controls. If exploited, attackers in a user account can access and share sensitive data outside approved channels.

level_thresholds.business_impact: Personal OneDrives often bypass team controls. If exploited, attackers in a user account can access and share sensitive data outside approved channels.
